spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 754,285 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 285,944.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: ...then you absorb the next 237,102 Magic damage within 15 sec.

Equip: Every 6 sec, Zap your target and 1 nearby enemy for 20,845 Nature damage.

Casting 30 spells Turbo-Charges you for 15 sec, doubling the frequency of your Zaps and upgrading them into Giga-Zaps, dealing 62,536 Nature Damage instead.

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,162 Intellect. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 67,733 Nature damage over 8 sec.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
